sourcesContent:
// src/data/movies.js

const movies = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: "Inception",
    year: "2010",
    posterUrl: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51FNt9bZATL._AC_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "A thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets, but ends up planting an idea.",
    rating: "8.8",
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    title: "Interstellar",
    year: "2014",
    posterUrl:
      "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71niXI3lxlL._AC_SY679_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to save humanity.",
    rating: "8.6",
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    title: "The Dark Knight",
    year: "2008",
    posterUrl: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51k0qa6qH-L._AC_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos in Gotham.",
    rating: "9.0",
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    title: "Avatar",
    year: "2009",
    posterUrl: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/41vuUoJ8v-L._AC_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "A paraplegic marine is sent to Pandora and joins the Na'vi in their struggle.",
    rating: "7.8",
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    title: "Titanic",
    year: "1997",
    posterUrl: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51rOnIjLqzL._AC_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "A romance blossoms aboard the doomed Titanic between Jack and Rose.",
    rating: "7.9",
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    title: "The Matrix",
    year: "1999",
    posterUrl: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51vpnbwFHrL._AC_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "A hacker learns the world is a simulation and joins the fight against machines.",
    rating: "8.7",
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    title: "Gladiator",
    year: "2000",
    posterUrl: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51A7rZmTqzL._AC_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor.",
    rating: "8.5",
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    title: "Avengers: Endgame",
    year: "2019",
    posterUrl:
      "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81ExhpBEbHL._AC_SY679_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "The Avengers assemble to reverse Thanos' snap and restore the universe.",
    rating: "8.4",
  },
  {
    id: 9,
    title: "Joker",
    year: "2019",
    posterUrl:
      "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71Kk9LB-5-L._AC_SY679_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "A failed comedian descends into madness and becomes the infamous Joker.",
    rating: "8.4",
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    title: "Spider-Man: No Way Home",
    year: "2021",
    posterUrl:
      "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/91xJvSQoM6L._AC_SY679_.jpg",
    shortPlot:
      "Peter Parker seeks Doctor Strange's help, unleashing villains from the multiverse.",
    rating: "8.3",
  },
];

export default movies;
